name: The Dice Show
description:
Welcome and welcome! This is the dice show! Participants can win the ULTIMATE price by playing and completing all 6 episodes. Do you have what it takes or do you feel lucky? ENTER NOW!!! By downloading and playing the game.

In The Dice Show participants can progress to the next episode by rolling all dice to the same specified target value. Participants can click or hold the left mouse button to create forces that will roll the dice.

Participants can enter multiple modes:

  • Marathon - Play all episodes in order to achieve a total marathon score.
  • Episode Select: - Play and unlock specific episodes.

When playing the game make sure to share your scores with the other participants!


is made by 1 person for the GMTK 2022 - Roll of The Dice
